name: Frame0
description:
Do you have big ideas but don’t want to wrestle with clunky wireframing software? Frame0 is a sleek Balsamiq-alternative wireframing tool for modern apps, built for speed and simplicity,
 that lets you sketch app prototypes in minutes with a crisp, hand-drawn look.

currentProject.name: Minkyu Lee
